name: gestalt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something such as a structure or experience that, when considered as a whole, has qualities that are more than the total of all its parts: This new biography is the first to consider fully the writer's gestalt.

considering or treating what a person experiences and believes as a whole and separate thing: gestalt psychology/psychotherapy In gestalt psychology and gestalt psychotherapy, people's thoughts and emotions are seen as complex wholes.
